price: Todo cuanto existe en los cielos y en la Tierra glorifica a Dios, el Soberano Supremo, el Santísimo, el Poderoso, el Sabio.
arabic: يُسَبِّحُ لِلَّهِ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ ٱلۡمَلِكِ ٱلۡقُدُّوسِ ٱلۡعَزِيزِ ٱلۡحَكِيمِ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: yusabbiḥu lillahi mā fī al-samāwāti wamā fī al-arḍi al-maliki al-qudūsi al-ʿazīzi al-ḥakīmi
